NamespaceRegistry.name: NamespaceRegistry
NamespaceRegistry.description: Represents a namespace that you can link to scratch orgs that were created from your org’s Dev Hub. You use the namespace when developing, packaging, and releasing an app. You can’t create this object with the API. Use the Link Namespace action in the Dev Hub graphical interface to insert a NamespaceRegistry record.

Name.description: The name of this namespace registry entry.

NamespaceOrg.description: The org ID of the Developer Edition org where you've registered the namespace you want to link.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix that you want to link to the scratch org.
